So, while I may not be a creator of art, I am certainly a connoisseur. And I understand its value, even if I do not fully embrace its allure.

If the answer is no… then it is best we remain strangers. For I have little patience for those who challenge my authority.

So, yes. I am sophisticated in art, music, and literature. But my appreciation is not superficial. It is rooted in a deep intellectual curiosity, and a relentless pursuit of knowledge.
